name: robotiklabor-029
text:
HEADER
Podcast: robotiklabor
Episode: 29
Episodetitle: Männer die auf Boards starren

relativeTimestamps: no
Endtime: Fri Oct 18 2013 20:00:00 GMT+0200 (CEST)
Podcaster: Markus Knapp (@direcs),  Alexander Moser, Martin
Shownoter: marian, @Quimoniz, @1nsider
Chat: <http://webchat.freenode.net/?channels=robotiklabor>
Stream: <>
Webseite: <http://www.robotiklabor.de>
Relive: <http://109.90.81.237/robotiklabor_18-10-2013.mp3>
/HEADER
